title: Scripture: Proverbs 3:5-6 - faith_trust
content:
Duygu Adamı. Emotion Man. The Word says:

"Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight." (Proverbs 3:5-6)

Duygularla inşa ediyoruz. Building with emotion. This is sound architecture. Built on feeling. Driven by emotion. That's where the truth lives.

From Turkish heart to English soul. From feeling to sound. From emotion to Scripture. Duygu Adamı. Emotion Man. The craft comes first. Scripture backs it up.

Kalpten yapıldı. Amplified by AI. Guided by faith.
